kvhc.util.db

Class ChannelDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • kvhc.util.db.ChannelDataSource

  • public class ChannelDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
    Channel object DAO.
    Author:
    kvhc

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChannelDataSource(Context context)
      The only constructor available, needs context for using the database.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open()
          throws SQLException
        Opens the DB for usage.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the database.

      • deleteChannel

        public void deleteChannel(Channel channel)
        Deletes a channel from the database.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel to delete.

      • getAllChannelsForSong

        public java.util.List<Channel> getAllChannelsForSong(Song song)
        Returns a list of channels for the specified channel (the song needs to be in the database). If the song is null or not in the database, the method will return an empty list of channels.
        Parameters:
        song - Song to which the Channels belongs.
        Returns:
        A list of the specified Song's channels.

      • save

        public void save(Song song,
        Channel channel)
        Saves a channel to a song, if the channel doesn't exists it is created. The Channel needs an for ID for the Channel to update. Also, if the song is null or not in the database the Channel won't be saved.
        Parameters:
        song - Song the channel belongs to.
        channel - The Channel to save.
